Package org.sensorhub.api.resource

Class ResourceFilter<T extends IResource>

java.lang.Object
org.sensorhub.api.resource.ResourceFilter<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of resource supported by this filter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Predicate<T>, IQueryFilter
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommandStreamFilter, DataStreamFilter, FeatureFilterBase, PropertyFilter
public abstract class ResourceFilter<T extends IResource> extends Object implements IQueryFilter, Predicate<T>

Immutable filter for any resource type.
It serves as a base for more advanced resource-specific filters.
There is an implicit AND between all filter parameters

    • intersect

      public abstract ResourceFilter<T> intersect(ResourceFilter<T> filter) throws EmptyFilterIntersection
      Computes the intersection (logical AND) between this filter and another filter of the same kind
      Parameters:
      filter - The other filter to AND with
      Returns:
      The new composite filter
      Throws:
      EmptyFilterIntersection - if the intersection doesn't exist
